verses.verse: Then <S%G5119><s%> spake <S%G2980><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> to the multitudes <S%G3793><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> to <S%G3101><s%> his <S%G846><s%> disciples <S%G3101><s%>,
saying <S%G3004><s%>, The scribes <S%G1122><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the Pharisees <S%G5330><s%> sit <S%G2523><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> Moses <S%G3475><s%> seat <S%G2515><s%>:

all <S%G3956><s%> things therefore <S%G3767><s%> whatsoever <S%G3745><s%> they bid <S%G2036><s%> you <S%G5213><s%>, these <S%G5083><s%> do <S%G4160><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> observe <S%G5083><s%>: but <S%G1161><s%> do <S%G4160><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> ye <S%G4160><s%> after <S%G2596><s%> their <S%G846><s%> works <S%G2041><s%>; for <S%G1063><s%> they say <S%G3004><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> do <S%G4160><s%> not <S%G3756><s%>.

Yea <S%G1063><s%>, they bind <S%G1195><s%> heavy <S%G926><s%> burdens <S%G5413><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> grievous to be borne <S%G1419><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> lay <S%G2007><s%> them on <S%G1909><s%> men <S%G444><s%>'s shoulders <S%G5606><s%>; but <S%G1161><s%> they themselves will <S%G2309><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> move <S%G2795><s%> them <S%G846><s%> with <S%G1147><s%> their <S%G846><s%> finger <S%G1147><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> their <S%G846><s%> works <S%G2041><s%> they do <S%G4160><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> be seen <S%G2300><s%> of men <S%G444><s%>: for they make broad <S%G4115><s%> their <S%G846><s%> phylacteries <S%G5440><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> enlarge <S%G3170><s%> the borders <S%G2899><s%> of <S%G2440><s%> their <S%G846><s%> garments <S%G2440><s%>,

and <S%G5037><s%> love <S%G5368><s%> the chief place <S%G4411><s%> at <S%G1722><s%> feasts <S%G1173><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> the chief seats <S%G4410><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the synagogues <S%G4864><s%>,
and <S%G2532><s%> the salutations <S%G783><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the marketplaces <S%G58><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> to be called <S%G2564><s%> of <S%G5259><s%> men <S%G444><s%>, Rabbi <S%G4461><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> call <S%G2564><s%> no <S%G3361><s%> man your <S%G5216><s%> father <S%G3962><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> the earth <S%G1093><s%>: for <S%G1063><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> Father <S%G3962><s%>, even he who is <S%G3588><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> heaven <S%G3772><s%>.
Neither <S%G3366><s%> be ye called <S%G2564><s%> masters <S%G2519><s%>: for <S%G1063><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> master <S%G2519><s%>, even the Christ <S%G5547><s%>.
But <S%G1161><s%> he that is greatest <S%G3187><s%> among you <S%G5216><s%> shall be <S%G2071><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> servant <S%G1249><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> whosoever <S%G3748><s%> shall exalt <S%G5312><s%> himself <S%G1438><s%> shall be humbled <S%G5013><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> whosoever shall <S%G3748><s%> humble <S%G5013><s%> himself <S%G1438><s%> shall be exalted <S%G5312><s%>.

But woe <S%G3759><s%> unto you <S%G5213><s%>, scribes <S%G1122><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Pharisees <S%G5330><s%>, hypocrites <S%G5273><s%>! because <S%G3754><s%> ye shut <S%G2808><s%> the kingdom <S%G932><s%> of heaven <S%G3772><s%> against <S%G1715><s%> men <S%G444><s%>: for <S%G1063><s%> ye <S%G5210><s%> enter not <S%G3756><s%> in <S%G1525><s%> yourselves <S%G3756><s%>, neither suffer ye <S%G5210><s%> them that are entering <S%G1525><s%> in to enter <S%G1525><s%>.

Woe <S%G3759><s%> unto you <S%G5213><s%>, scribes <S%G1122><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Pharisees <S%G5330><s%>, hypocrites <S%G5273><s%>! for <S%G3754><s%> ye compass <S%G4013><s%> sea <S%G2281><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> land <S%G3584><s%> to make <S%G4160><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> proselyte <S%G4339><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> when <S%G3752><s%> he is become <S%G1096><s%> so <S%G4160><s%>, ye make him <S%G846><s%> twofold more <S%G1362><s%> a son <S%G5207><s%> of hell <S%G1067><s%> than yourselves <S%G5216><s%>.

Woe <S%G3759><s%> unto you <S%G5213><s%>, ye blind <S%G5185><s%> guides <S%G3595><s%>, that say <S%G3004><s%>, Whosoever <S%G3739><s%> shall swear <S%G3660><s%> by <S%G1722><s%> the temple <S%G3485><s%>, it is <S%G2076><s%> nothing <S%G3762><s%>; but <S%G1161><s%> whosoever <S%G3739><s%> shall swear <S%G3660><s%> by <S%G1722><s%> the gold <S%G5557><s%> of the temple <S%G3485><s%>, he is a debtor <S%G3784><s%>.

Ye fools <S%G3474><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> blind <S%G5185><s%>: for <S%G1063><s%> which <S%G5101><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> greater <S%G3187><s%>, the gold <S%G5557><s%>, or <S%G2228><s%> the temple <S%G3485><s%> that hath sanctified <S%G37><s%> the gold <S%G5557><s%>?

And <S%G3739><s%>, Whosoever <S%G1437><s%> shall swear <S%G3660><s%> by <S%G1722><s%> the altar <S%G2379><s%>, it is <S%G2076><s%> nothing <S%G3762><s%>; but <S%G1161><s%> whosoever <S%G302><s%> shall swear <S%G3660><s%> by <S%G1722><s%> the gift <S%G1435><s%> that is upon <S%G1883><s%> it <S%G846><s%>, he is a debtor <S%G3784><s%>.

Ye blind <S%G5185><s%>: for <S%G1063><s%> which <S%G5101><s%> is greater <S%G3173><s%>, the gift <S%G1435><s%>, or <S%G2228><s%> the altar <S%G2379><s%> that sanctifieth <S%G37><s%> the gift <S%G1435><s%>?

He <S%G3660><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> that sweareth <S%G3660><s%> by <S%G1722><s%> the altar <S%G2379><s%>, sweareth <S%G3660><s%> by <S%G1722><s%> it <S%G846><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> by <S%G1722><s%> all things <S%G3956><s%> thereon <S%G846><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> he that sweareth <S%G3660><s%> by <S%G1722><s%> the temple <S%G3485><s%>, sweareth <S%G3660><s%> by <S%G1722><s%> it <S%G846><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> by <S%G1722><s%> him that dwelleth <S%G2730><s%> therein <S%G846><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> he that sweareth <S%G3660><s%> by <S%G1722><s%> the heaven <S%G3772><s%>, sweareth <S%G3660><s%> by <S%G1722><s%> the throne <S%G2362><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> by <S%G1722><s%> him that sitteth <S%G2521><s%> thereon <S%G846><s%>.

Woe <S%G3759><s%> unto you <S%G5213><s%>, scribes <S%G1122><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Pharisees <S%G5330><s%>, hypocrites <S%G5273><s%>! for <S%G3754><s%> ye tithe <S%G586><s%> mint <S%G2238><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> anise <S%G432><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> cummin <S%G2951><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> have left undone <S%G863><s%> the weightier <S%G926><s%> matters of the law <S%G3551><s%>, justice <S%G2532><s%>, and mercy <S%G1656><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> faith <S%G4102><s%>: but these <S%G5023><s%> ye <S%G1163><s%> ought to have done <S%G4160><s%>, and <S%G2548><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> to have left <S%G863><s%> the other <S%G2548><s%> undone <S%G863><s%>.
Ye blind <S%G5185><s%> guides <S%G3595><s%>, that strain out <S%G1368><s%> the gnat <S%G2971><s%>, and <S%G1161><s%> swallow <S%G2666><s%> the camel <S%G2574><s%>!

Woe <S%G3759><s%> unto you <S%G5213><s%>, scribes <S%G1122><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Pharisees <S%G5330><s%>, hypocrites <S%G5273><s%>! for <S%G3754><s%> ye cleanse <S%G2511><s%> the outside <S%G1855><s%> of the cup <S%G4221><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> of the platter <S%G3953><s%>, but <S%G1161><s%> within <S%G2081><s%> they are full <S%G1073><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> extortion <S%G724><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> excess <S%G192><s%>.

Thou blind <S%G5185><s%> Pharisee <S%G5330><s%>, cleanse <S%G2511><s%> first <S%G4412><s%> the inside <S%G1787><s%> of the cup <S%G4221><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> of the platter <S%G3953><s%>, that <S%G2443><s%> the outside <S%G1622><s%> thereof <S%G846><s%> may become <S%G1096><s%> clean <S%G2513><s%> also <S%G2532><s%>.

Woe <S%G3759><s%> unto you <S%G5213><s%>, scribes <S%G1122><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Pharisees <S%G5330><s%>, hypocrites <S%G5273><s%>! for <S%G3754><s%> ye are like unto <S%G3945><s%> whited <S%G2867><s%> sepulchres <S%G5028><s%>, which <S%G3748><s%> outwardly <S%G1855><s%> appear <S%G5316><s%> beautiful <S%G5611><s%>, but <S%G1161><s%> inwardly <S%G2081><s%> are <S%G1073><s%> full <S%G1073><s%> of <S%G3747><s%> dead <S%G3498><s%> men <S%G3747><s%>'s bones, and <S%G2532><s%> of <S%G3747><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> uncleanness <S%G167><s%>.

Even so <S%G3779><s%> ye <S%G5210><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> outwardly <S%G1855><s%> appear <S%G5316><s%> righteous <S%G1342><s%> unto men <S%G444><s%>, but <S%G1161><s%> inwardly <S%G2081><s%> ye are <S%G2075><s%> full <S%G3324><s%> of hypocrisy <S%G5272><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> iniquity <S%G458><s%>.

Woe <S%G3759><s%> unto you <S%G5213><s%>, scribes <S%G1122><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Pharisees <S%G5330><s%>, hypocrites <S%G5273><s%>! for <S%G3754><s%> ye build <S%G3618><s%> the sepulchres <S%G5028><s%> of the prophets <S%G4396><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> garnish <S%G2885><s%> the tombs <S%G3419><s%> of the righteous <S%G1342><s%>,

and <S%G2532><s%> say <S%G3004><s%>, If <S%G1487><s%> we had been <S%G1510><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the days <S%G2250><s%> of <S%G3962><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> fathers <S%G3962><s%>, we <S%G302><s%> should <S%G1510><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> have been <S%G1510><s%> partakers <S%G2844><s%> with them <S%G846><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the blood <S%G129><s%> of the prophets <S%G4396><s%>.
Wherefore <S%G5620><s%> ye witness <S%G3140><s%> to yourselves <S%G1438><s%>, that <S%G3754><s%> ye are <S%G2075><s%> sons <S%G5207><s%> of them that slew <S%G5407><s%> the prophets <S%G4396><s%>.
Fill <S%G4137><s%> ye <S%G5210><s%> up <S%G4137><s%> then <S%G2532><s%> the measure <S%G3358><s%> of <S%G3962><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> fathers <S%G3962><s%>.
Ye serpents <S%G3789><s%>, ye offspring <S%G1081><s%> of vipers <S%G2191><s%>, how shall <S%G4459><s%> ye escape <S%G5343><s%> the <S%G575><s%> judgment <S%G2920><s%> of hell <S%G1067><s%>?

Therefore <S%G5124><s%>, behold <S%G2400><s%>, I <S%G1473><s%> send <S%G649><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> prophets <S%G4396><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> wise men <S%G4680><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> scribes <S%G1122><s%>: some of <S%G1537><s%> them <S%G846><s%> shall ye kill <S%G615><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> crucify <S%G4717><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> some of <S%G1537><s%> them <S%G846><s%> shall ye scourge <S%G3146><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> synagogues <S%G4864><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> persecute <S%G1377><s%> from <S%G575><s%> city <S%G4172><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> city <S%G4172><s%>:

that <S%G3704><s%> upon <S%G1909><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> may come <S%G2064><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the righteous <S%G1342><s%> blood <S%G129><s%> shed <S%G1632><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> the earth <S%G1093><s%>, from <S%G575><s%> the blood <S%G129><s%> of Abel <S%G6><s%> the righteous <S%G1342><s%> unto <S%G2193><s%> the blood <S%G129><s%> of Zachariah <S%G2197><s%> son <S%G5207><s%> of Barachiah <S%G914><s%>, whom <S%G3739><s%> ye slew <S%G5407><s%> between <S%G3342><s%> the sanctuary <S%G3485><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the altar <S%G2379><s%>.
Verily <S%G281><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> unto you <S%G5213><s%>, All <S%G3956><s%> these things <S%G5023><s%> shall come <S%G2240><s%> upon <S%G1909><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> generation <S%G1074><s%>.

O Jerusalem <S%G2419><s%>, Jerusalem <S%G2419><s%>, that killeth <S%G615><s%> the prophets <S%G4396><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> stoneth <S%G3036><s%> them that are sent <S%G649><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> her <S%G846><s%>! how often <S%G4212><s%> would I have <S%G2309><s%> gathered <S%G1996><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> children <S%G5043><s%> together <S%G1996><s%>, even <S%G3739><s%> as <S%G5158><s%> a hen <S%G3733><s%> gathereth <S%G1996><s%> her <S%G1438><s%> chickens <S%G3556><s%> under <S%G5259><s%> her wings <S%G4420><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> ye would <S%G2309><s%> not <S%G3756><s%>!
Behold <S%G2400><s%>, your <S%G5216><s%> house <S%G3624><s%> is left <S%G863><s%> unto you <S%G5213><s%> desolate <S%G2048><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> unto you <S%G5213><s%>, Ye shall <S%G1492><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> see <S%G1492><s%> me <S%G3165><s%> henceforth <S%G737><s%>, till <S%G2193><s%> ye <S%G302><s%> shall say <S%G2036><s%>, Blessed <S%G2127><s%> is he that cometh <S%G2064><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the name <S%G3686><s%> of the Lord <S%G2962><s%>.
